title: Maritime Team Project
description:
This module (3 to a team) aims to provide students with the opportunity to integrate knowledge and theory on maritime technology and management acquired during the programme. Students will work on martime related issues/problems. There will be two mentors (a faculty member and another from the industry). Examples of
project topics are martime safety and security, green  shipping and logistics, and impact of ICT on maritime operations, port efficiency and effectiveness.
